formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Information on Grandview University’s Disability-Accommodation Practices

Dear Professor [John] [Last Name],

I hope you are doing well. As part of the current federal audit, I am compiling documentation on Grandview University’s compliance with disability-accommodation requirements. Could you kindly provide the materials and clarifications listed below at your earliest convenience?

1. Current disability-services policy manual and any recent addenda or memos.  
2. Procedures for requesting, reviewing, and approving accommodations (including timelines and responsible offices).  
3. Aggregate data (no personally identifying information) on accommodation requests and approvals for the past three academic years.  
4. Copies of standard accommodation agreements or letters issued to students.  
5. Training materials used to educate faculty and staff on disability support and ADA/Section 504 compliance.  
6. Details of physical-accessibility audits or improvements completed since 2021.  
7. Contact information for key personnel (e.g., Director of Disability Services, ADA/504 Coordinator).

If it is more convenient, feel free to share links or grant me temporary access to your university’s shared drive or Notion workspace where these resources may already be stored.

Please let me know if any of the requested items require additional time to assemble, or if a brief meeting would help clarify my needs.

Thank you very much for your cooperation.

Sincerely,

Mr. James Thompson  
Federal Compliance Auditor  
Office of Postsecondary Accessibility Oversight  
thompson.gov@email.com  
(555) 123-4567
